title: Innovation Centre set to spark jobs creation and business growth (Belfast City Council)
text: ( Source : Belfast City Council ) 5 Oct 2015 Part of the former Mackie's site is being transformed into an ideas hub for new and growing businesses under ambitious plans by Belfast City Council. The Â£ 9.1 million Innovation Centre , at
